title: EastEnders spoilers: Chantelle confides in Karen after miscarriage
text:
Chantelle Atkins (Jessica Plummer) was left devastated in EastEnders earlier this week when she realised she’d had a miscarriage and, in the coming episodes, she informs her mum Karen Taylor (Lorraine Stanley) about what’s transpired.

With Gray (Toby Alexander-Smith) pulling out all the stops to keep her at home, Chantelle was delighted to have the opportunity to cover a shift at the salon earlier this week. Gray decided that he deemed such an action a betrayal and, as a result, he hosted a party in The Queen Vic in retaliation to announce his wife’s pregnancy — in spite of her requesting him to keep it a secret for the time being.

However, unbeknown to Gray, Chantelle had been having stomach pains and, upon going to hospital, she was informed that she’d had a miscarriage. Devastated, Chantelle pleaded with Ash (Gurlaine Kaur Garcha) to keep the loss of the baby a secret.

She later attempted to open up to Gray, but he proceeded to tell her how delighted he was with life, and thus she was unable to do so.

However, the weight of what’s happened becomes too much for Chantelle and, in the coming episodes, she breaks down and informs Karen about her miscarriage.

Naturally, Karen supports her daughter.

The big question is: will Gray find out the truth?

He’s never missed an opportunity to remind Chantelle of how much he’s looking forward to being a dad again and, with Chantelle happy that Gray’s finally getting help for his violent behaviour, it’s no wonder she’s afraid to tell him.

Will Karen perhaps spill the beans to Gray?

Or will Chantelle warn her mum to keep shtum?

EastEnders airs these scenes Thursday 24thOctober on BBC One at 7:30pm.
